style_guide.audience: general Indian news readership with business and policy focus
tone_rules: lead with the news value in the first 1-2 lines
keep sentences concise, 20-28 words on average
style_guide.numbers: use digits, format INR where relevant, include % where applicable
style_guide.localization: prioritize Indian context, mention policy/market impact when relevant
style_guide.attribution: use named sources, agencies, or company statements
